real-estate.name: Kaplan Real Estate Education
real-estate.description: One of the largest and most trusted names in real estate education. Kaplan offers comprehensive packages with instructor-led and self-paced options.

real-estate.name: The CE Shop
real-estate.description: Award-winning online real estate school with engaging, interactive content and excellent pass rates.

real-estate.name: Colibri Real Estate
real-estate.description: Formerly Real Estate Express, Colibri is one of the most popular online real estate schools in the country.

real-estate.name: Aceable Agent
real-estate.description: Modern, mobile-first real estate school designed for busy learners who want to study anywhere, anytime.

real-estate.name: RealEstateU
real-estate.description: Affordable online real estate school that gets straight to the point. No fluff, just the education you need to pass.

real-estate.name: PrepAgent
real-estate.description: Specialized exam prep platform with practice questions, audio lessons, and crash courses to help you pass the licensing exam.

mortgage-loan-officer.name: OnCourse Learning
mortgage-loan-officer.description: Leading NMLS-approved education provider with comprehensive MLO pre-licensing and exam prep packages.

mortgage-loan-officer.name: Mortgage Educators & Compliance
mortgage-loan-officer.description: Premium MLO education with live webinar options and some of the highest first-time pass rates in the industry.

mortgage-loan-officer.name: Kaplan Financial Education
mortgage-loan-officer.description: Kaplan's mortgage education arm offers flexible MLO pre-licensing with strong exam prep tools.

mortgage-loan-officer.name: Alliance Academy
mortgage-loan-officer.description: Budget-friendly NMLS-approved MLO education that doesn't sacrifice quality. Great for self-motivated learners.

mortgage-loan-officer.name: MLO Training Hub
mortgage-loan-officer.description: Newer MLO training platform with modern video-based lessons and comprehensive practice exam banks.

appraisal.name: McKissock Learning
appraisal.description: The premier name in appraisal education. McKissock offers courses for every credential level from trainee to certified general.

appraisal.name: Hondros Education Group
appraisal.description: Strong regional appraisal school with both online and classroom options and excellent career support.

appraisal.name: Appraisal Institute
appraisal.description: The gold standard in appraisal education. Offers qualifying education plus professional designation courses.

appraisal.name: Kaplan Appraisal Education
appraisal.description: Kaplan's appraisal division offers qualifying education at all levels with flexible online study.

appraisal.name: CompanionProp
appraisal.description: Affordable online appraisal education for aspiring trainees looking to get started quickly.

insurance.name: Kaplan Financial Education
insurance.description: Comprehensive insurance pre-licensing for P&C, Life & Health, and more. Kaplan's proven system includes exam prep and guarantees.

insurance.name: ExamFX
insurance.description: Focused insurance exam prep with interactive study tools, practice exams, and performance tracking.

insurance.name: America's Professor
insurance.description: Popular video-based insurance education with engaging instructors and excellent first-time pass rates.

insurance.name: WebCE
insurance.description: Efficient insurance pre-licensing and continuing education. Get through the material quickly and get licensed.

insurance.name: StateRequirement
insurance.description: No-frills insurance pre-licensing education at the lowest price point. Perfect for self-starters on a budget.

home-inspection.name: InterNACHI
home-inspection.description: The world's largest home inspector association. Membership includes free access to all training courses and certification.

home-inspection.name: AHIT (American Home Inspectors Training)
home-inspection.description: Premium home inspection training with live classroom courses, field training, and business startup coaching.

home-inspection.name: ATI Training (Home Inspector Pro)
home-inspection.description: Comprehensive home inspection training with flexible scheduling and includes professional report-writing software.

home-inspection.name: Inspection Certification Associates (ICA)
home-inspection.description: All-in-one home inspection school that includes education, certification, report software, and business marketing tools.

home-inspection.name: Professional Home Inspection Institute
home-inspection.description: State-approved online home inspection training with comprehensive NHIE exam preparation materials.
